View on GitHub

View the /etc/mtab file for list of currently mounted fs

Add entries in /etc/fstab

To mount filesystems using the filesystem LABEL

blkid # to display existing UUID partition properties e2label /dev/sdc1 /data # to set the LABEL to /data

cat /etc/mtab to view the mounted properties of the existing mounts vim /etc/fstab LABEL=/data /data ext4 defaults 1 2
